showerReviews.reviewText: Not reliable. I called to find out what time in the morning they opened up so I could get a shower, they said 5 am. While my husband was inside he also asked and they said 6. Then they were late opening, we have a wide load on and daylight ‚Ä¶
It's expensive. $10 parking $10 shower... better than being dirty with violated logs though.
Good place to stop shower,restaurant, friendly service .

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ kids made for super long bathroom lines. I had my young son with me who needed to go badly and one of the Love's associates offered for us to use the bathroom in one of their shower rooms. What a kind gesture that I cannot express.our ‚Ä¶
Garbage bins are full outside. shower toilet wasn't flushed and towels' wern't changed after previous customer

I get this is a corporate company, but when you open in a small town and gain customers from the residents there you‚Äôd think you all would open your showers to the residents that have no water, or home to go to after the flood. When you was ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ on it, but ultimately,  it's still a just a pig. All their new sod is dying from lack of care.  I go in to get a shower.  5 people at fuel desk.   *Crickets*  I GREET THEM.  *Crickets*  I say "Alrighty then" and finally a younger gal ‚Ä¶

Parked truck,showered and ate twice at the Petro.Shower was exceptionally clean and hot.The Petro customer service was really great and I was in awe it‚Äôs been a while since I‚Äôve had a experience like that couldn‚Äôt help but smile and be ‚Ä¶
Shower #6 has draining issues
Absolutely would not let me park out of spot for 30 mins to take a shower . I'm glad God has changed me is all I can say
You need to talk to about drying the towels well, they fold them wet and they smell bad, and here I am in the shower waiting to dry myself with just the fan .,
shower not clean properly üòí ‚Ä¶

locations.title: ONE9 Travel Center
locations.content: ONE9 Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Big clean shower for drivers..

‚Ä¶ My wife, her 2 fully task trained service dogs and I have stopped in here 3 times and showered no issues. We never cause any problems, neither have my wife‚Äôs service dogs, we talked with the GM about my wife‚Äôs service dogs before and he ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ lot and kept travel in the next day. It‚Äôs really nice because you can get up in the morning after sleeping in a vehicle all night and go in and have a shower if you want and a hot meal. The bathrooms are clean and the service is good. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ get truck in and out of. Very small and tight parking also. No hot food. Tired of seeing subway everywhere. Shower was nice and clean, towels didn‚Äôt smell fresh though. Typical Pilot. Nothing exciting. Wish they had bean to cup coffee ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ for the night. Upon arrival my husband went inside to use the restroom. Afterwards, we both entered the store to shower.  the showers were clean but very small.  Later in the evening, we sat in the truck making sandwiches so hubs went ‚Ä¶

After a long drive went inside to get a shower guess what she said they all down she says low pressure.. yea right‚Äô‚Äô instead fixing the problem they on the phone watching videos and making fun they should be all fired specially management ‚Ä¶
Niki is/was very helpful to find My shower log in number, and she has a pretty smile.

This truck stop is big.

But unfortunately the toilet seat in my shower was not cleaned.
It was clean,nice,friendly yes the shower was also very clean......
Showering here is the best shower‚Äôs are spotless

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ so I didn‚Äôt get to fill up the food station for hot food you can tell hasn‚Äôt been cleaned in awhile and outside had trash all over. It does have a shower area and little area for bigger trucks to park.  This pilot does have a subway inside.

‚Ä¶ My conversation. Justin and to the rest of the crew keep up the good work. This place was definitely clean inside and out. I was even able to enjoy a nice hot shower. Also there's a Subway if you're hungry. Thanks again for your service.

‚Ä¶ water.  Sinks in the bathroom had hot water.   Changed his story when confronted.   No staff to clean showers stated he had to stay out front.   However, there is nowhere to be found in front.   Took a shower that was dirty üò≥ üò≥  oh well ‚Ä¶

Parking is all on hills.  Don't waste your time coming here on weekends.  You won't get the Pilot guaranteed "clean, hot shower".  As usual the manager shut the showers down on a Sunday to save a buck.  She refused to clean showers so that ‚Ä¶

To be straight forward the place is under HEAVY renovation, i stopped for a shower and there was NO hot water, while waiting 5-10 mins trying to let the water warm up everytime a toilet flushed or water was used the pressure went way down ‚Ä¶
One star is too much for this nasty place!!! Is inadmisible after hours driving you can‚Äôt take a shower‚Ä¶

Well, I would rate the showers, But I've been "Next in line" for an hour now. It was my only reason for parking here, and can't get a shower at 4am!?! Bathrooms was nasty too. So much for 'extra cleanliness' during a pandemic.

Friendly customer service.But the manager Tyler is lazy and a liar. I spent about an HR waiting for a shower and Tyler said we only have 4 showers and they're being used. But this wasn't the case. There was at least one shower open and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Traveling from Texas to Massachusetts. Needed a shower and a place t park for the night. Shower room was a bathroom with shower, full size sink, and a private toilet. It was super clean. They supplied towel, wash cloth, and cloth bath mat. ‚Ä¶

Bathroom for men was filthy,  common problem at most Pilots it seems.  Shower in the morning was clean and hot, 5 stars for that.  Not much truck parking and over full early with all the 'creative's spots quickly filled.

locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: TA is a great stop for travelers and truckers, offering plenty of parking spaces that are well-organized and easy to access. The parking lots are clean and well-maintained, making it a comfortable and hassle-free experience. Whether you‚Äôre ‚Ä¶

They don‚Äôt check to see if you paid to park in reserve spots.They shut down the showers Friday night because they didn‚Äôt have a porter. Now there‚Äôs no water pressure to get a shower,wash clothes or to flush the toilets but they will take your money for fuel. Avoid this place if possible

I enjoy this little truck stop. I absolutely love parking to where I can stare at the mountain with the lush green trees.
The restrooms are always clean, there is a mechanic shop if you need something ‚Ä¶

my husband and i stopped here while we were otw back home. i had left my keys in the bathroom and i live about 6 hours away. so thankful for the person who turned in my keys and for the staff who was kind enough to send them out to me. thank y‚Äôall so much!
